item.description:
Location Update:

Alright, the moment you've all been waiting for has almost arrived. Field Day for Justice is going down today at 1pm near the Stony Brook T stop on the Orange line.

We're moving Field Day for Justice one block over to the field by New Minton Street due to the festival at the Stony Brook T field. Just walk one block down Amory towards the tennis courts and you'll find us. We'll be the ones having all kinds of fun with water balloons and orange cones.

What's included in Field Day, you ask? Oh, just an Egg Race, Balloon Toss, Sponge-Bucket Race, 3-Legged Race, and Tug of War! Other possibilities include: Parachute games, Blob Tag, Red Rover, Human Knot, and Crab Soccer.

Rest up! Not only is it gonna be a scorcher, but some SoJusters have been known to be pretty fierce competitors! (Of course, it's all fun and games...)
item.name: Field Day for Justice
